{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Fleet Master Wakoyo |image = Portrait Wakoyo convo.png |image2 = PE2 Fleet Master Wakoyo.png |caption = |race = Aumaua |subrace = Coastal |gender = Male |culture = [Rauatai](/rauatai/) |background = [Soldier](/soldier/) |faction = [Royal Deadfire Company](/royalDeadfireCompany/) |deity = |personality = |class = Chanter |level = 13 |MIG = 14 |CON = 16 |DEX = 11 |PER = 9 |INT = 15 |RES = 13 |health = 208 |damage = 16-21 {{crush}} / 19-24 {{pierce}} |accuracy = 63 / 59 |penetration = 11 / 8 |deflection = 59 |fortitude = 81 |reflex = 61 |will = 82 |dr = 8 |dr slash = 6 |dr shock = 6 |ability = [Towering Physique](/toweringPhysiqueDeadfire/), [Come, Come Soft Winds of Death](/comeComeSoftWindsOfDeathDeadfire/), [Dull the Edge, Blunt the Point](/dullTheEdgeBluntThePointDeadfire/), [Old Siec Would Not Rest 'til His Hunger Was Sated](/oldSiecWouldNotRestTilHisHungerWasSatedDeadfire/), [The Fox from the Farmer Did Run and Leap](/theFoxFromTheFarmerDidRunAndLeapDeadfire/), [The Long Night's Drink Birthed the Revenge of Morning](/theLongNightsDrinkBirthedTheRevengeOfMorning/), [They Shielded Their Eyes 'Gainst the Fampyr's Gaze](/theyShieldedTheirEyesGainstTheFampyrsGazeDeadfire/), [Thick Grew Their Tongues, Stumbling O'er Words](/thickGrewTheirTonguesStumblingOerWordsDeadfire/), [At the Sound of His Voice, the Killers Froze Stiff](/atTheSoundOfHisVoiceTheKillersFrozeStiffDeadfire/), [...Its Crash Could Not Be Denied](/itsCrashCouldNotBeDenied/), [Ben Fidel's Neck Was Exposed](/benFidelsNeckWasExposed/), [Seven Nights She Waited While the White Winds Wept](/sevenNightsSheWaitedWhileTheWhiteWindsWeptDeadfire/), [Their Champion Braved The Horde Alone](/theirChampionBravedTheHordeAloneDeadfire/) |location = [Fleet Master's Office](/fleetMastersOfficeTheBrassCitadel/), [The Brass Citadel](/theBrassCitadel/) |quests = [Bounty - Assila Wave-Skipper](/bountyAssilaWaveSkipper/)
[Bounty - Radulf](/bountyRadulf/)
[Bounty - Burunga](/bountyBurunga/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = [Small Key](/smallKey/) |cape = Green Cape |body = Fine Breastplate (Deadfire){{!}}Fine Breastplate |weapon1 = Exceptional Mace (Deadfire){{!}}Exceptional Mace |weapon1_offhand = Fine Pistol (Deadfire){{!}}Fine Pistol |ring1 = Ring of Minor Protection |internalname = CHA_08_RD_Fleetmaster_Hikowa |guid = 612ab6ae-51dd-4a1d-902c-8b156176d718 }} '''Fleet Master Wakoyo''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background {{Description|Wakoyo crosses his arms and tips his head to the side. A long scar traces a path down his face, curving sharply where his cheek rises with a smile.}} A Fleet Master of the [Royal Deadfire Company](/royalDeadfireCompany/), Wakoyo is a friendly officer with a long scar tracing a path down his face. He handles logistics, bureaucracy, and other affairs required by the RDC's presence in Deadfire. Another thing he handles? Bounties. Unmoored and independent, ''[The Defiant](/theDefiant/)'' and the Watcher are a perfect asset for him and the company. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = * [Bounty - Assila Wave-Skipper](/bountyAssilaWaveSkipper/) * [Bounty - Radulf](/bountyRadulf/) * [Bounty - Burunga](/bountyBurunga/) |quests_involved = |none = |other = * A Watcher of the Rauataian culture has unique dialogue with Wakoyo during his introductory dialogue. * If [Maia](/maia/) is in the party, the Fleet Master will ask if she vouches for you. }} ## =Quests = * Wakoyo hands out RDC bounties. [Category:The Brass Citadel characters](/categoryTheBrassCitadelCharacters/)

A long scar traces a path down his face, curving sharply where his cheek rises with a smile.}} A Fleet Master of the [[Royal Deadfire Company]], Wakoyo is a friendly officer with a long scar tracing a path down his face. He handles logistics, bureaucracy, and other affairs required by the RDC's presence in Deadfire. Another thing he handles? Bounties. Unmoored and independent, ''[[The Defiant]]'' and the Watcher are a perfect asset for him and the company. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = * [[Bounty - Assila Wave-Skipper]] * [[Bounty - Radulf]] * [[Bounty - Burunga]] |quests_involved = |none = |other = * A Watcher of the Rauataian culture has unique dialogue with Wakoyo during his introductory dialogue. * If [[Maia]] is in the party, the Fleet Master will ask if she vouches for you. }} ===Quests=== * Wakoyo hands out RDC bounties. title: Fleet Master Wakoyo
